name: NSUserAutomatorTask
desc: An object that executes Automator workflows.

items.name: func execute(withInput: NSSecureCoding?, completionHandler: NSUserAutomatorTask.CompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Execute the Automator workflow by providing it as securely coded input.

items.name: var variables: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The variables required by the Automator workflow.

items.name: typealias NSUserAutomatorTask.CompletionHandler
items.desc: Implement this block to retrieve the output of the Automator workflow executed by execute(withInput:completionHandler:).
